settings.title: What are your estimated shipping times?
settings.content: Standard shipping takes approximately 3-5 business days. Expedited shipping takes approximately 2-3 business days.

settings.title: Do you offer expedited shipping?
settings.content: Yes! We do offer expedited shipping (2-3 business days) across the United States and Canada. Please note this is an additional charge, and will be charged at checkout.

settings.title: How long are your processing times?
settings.content: We work as quickly as possible to get your package shipped out to you in a few days. However, during peak seasons, your order may take up to 4 business days to process.

settings.title: How much is shipping?
settings.content: Orders over $75 (before tax) ship free, with standard shipping, to Canada and the United States. Orders to Puerto Rico, Hawaii, and Alaska have a $30 shipping charge; this fee is waived on orders over $200.

settings.title: What is your return policy?
settings.content:
We think you’ll love using our products as much as we love making them. However, if you’re not 100% happy with your choice, we’re here to help.

Full priced devices can be exchanged or returned within 30 days of purchase (devices include diffusers and humidifiers). Essential oils and natural air freshener sprays can be exchanged or returned within 15 days of purchase.

Discounted items are eligible for exchange or return for store credit within 15 days of purchase.

Items purchased with a gift card are eligible for exchange or store credit. To return or exchange a natural air freshener spray or diffuser bundle, please reach out to our customer experience team at hello@vitruvi.com.

If you are located in the US, to start your return or exchange please visit our Returns Center here. https://vitruvi-us.loopreturns.com/
If you are located in Canada, please email our team at hello@vitruvi.com to start your return or exchange.
